title: Kingsmill owner agrees to buy Hovis in deal to create UK’s biggest bread brand
summary: Jobs expected to go if competition watchdog approves takeover by Associated British Foods The owner of Kingsmill has agreed to buy its rival Hovis in a deal that would create the UK’s biggest bread brand if the competition regulator approves it, but also put jobs at risk. The deal comes after decades of decline in the popularity of the packaged sliced loaf, with Hovis, owned by the private equity company Endless, and its rival Kingsmill – part of Associated British Foods (ABF) – struggling to get out of the red for some years. title: Czech Police Arrest Convicted Trafficker Linked to Multi-Million-Dollar Bitcoin Scandal
summary: Czech authorities have arrested convicted drug trafficker Tomas Jirikovsky in a deepening probe into a $45 million Bitcoin donation to the Ministry of Justice. The post Czech Police Arrest Convicted Trafficker Linked to Multi-Million-Dollar Bitcoin Scandal appeared first on Cryptonews .
